_header: Thou mighty Lord O Ruler and Regnant
Subjects: God, hymns to; hymns, to God
_description: The hymn ‘Rector potens verax deus’ — two stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd34193.First Lines:
Thow myghty lord O Ruler and regnantSothfast god that hast in
                    gouernance…
BLAdd34193.Last Lines:
…Soo þat owr soules eye mot seruf theIn rest and pees and
                    perfyt charite
BLAdd34193.Editions:
Patterson,  Frank A. 
             “Hymnal from MS. Additional 34193, British Museum.” 
             Medieval Studies in Memory of Gertrude Schoepperle Loomis.
            Roger Sherman Loomis, ed. 
         New York: Columbia UP, 1927: 443-88: 477.
